评论详情: I really like these joggers, they are incredibly comfortable and soft. The length is perfect, I’m 5’5 and the size medium joggers don’t need to be hemmed and they aren’t short. The pants look nice too, they can be worn when going out to run errands, etc. Barefoot Dreams puts out very nice, well made clothing and these joggers are typical for their high  quality, comfortable and attractive clothing., The cost is reasonable when you consider the great product you’ll be buying. I have Barefoot Dreams clothes from 2020 and all look just as nice as the day I bought them.
I wore this on a 6-hour plane flight. It wasn't as comfortable as I thought. It stretched out some and didn't look like the pictures anymore. Too expensive for what it was.

评论概述: Soft and beautiful fit but see through
评论详情: Barefoot dreams products are so soft, and I was so excited to see these. the joggers fit perfectly, 5'7 135 lbs. But the sea salt color is way too see through. perhaps if you had lighter skin they wouldnt be so jarring. but I could absolutely not wear these in public so I had to return.

I bought 2 pair for my daughters.  They were supposed to be for Christmas but I let them have them early.  They loved them.  These lounge pants are soft, comfortable and the daughter that lives with me has only took them off to wash.  She wears them to lounge around the house or visit friends.  No regrets buying them at all.

I have longer legs but I never order tall in any ring — I am 5’7 and 150 lbs postpartum and I got a Medium which fit but are too short. They ride up my calves and when I’m seated the pants come up my ankles defeating the purpose of a warm sweatpant. Also not very flattering in the butt. For the price I want more.

评论概述: My favorite pants to put on
评论详情: I’m addicted to this brand. I always order a smaller size and the fit is perfect. I’m 5.9” so I love the length!  Definitely worth it I have 4 pairs of pants and 4 short sleeve matching sweaters absolutely love them and get compliments every time I wear them. Wash in cold delicate and hang dry they look brand new after over 20 washes!
Saw this brand in a department store but they didn't have my size amazon did and I"m so glad I bought it it's so soft and comfy

I've been wanting to have some barefoot dreams track pants for lounging at home when it gets cool out again.  Best to get ahead of time since they sell out.  I'm 5'5" and 120lbs.  Bought size S.  They fit perfectly.  I have long legs for my height but any longer and these would be a little short.  The hit my ankle with just a little bit of puff at the cuff.  I'd prefer if the fabric folded over the ankle cuff more, but they are fine as is and the fabric is heavenly.
Size Large and Love how they feel and fit

评论概述: What You See Is What You Get
评论详情: I am a fan of Barefoot dreams, and their products are so soft and cozy. I would recommend looking at specific garment measurements for any item to get your best fit. I purchased these track pants in my usual size and the fit is great. I would suggest washing in cold water, delicate cycle, lay flat to dry and fold as opposed to hanging for storage.
Super soft and cozy! Have several items from barefoot and love them all! Fits exactly as expected.
I love barefoot dreams clothing. As matter fact I have the pants on right now they are so comfy
These are dreamy lounge clothes for a chilly house, and the best pajamas when the temps fall in the winter.
pants that fit really good and i got the matching sleeveless vest i would buy again

评论概述: Sizing review that should help u.
评论详情: I am writing this review only b/c when I was reading the reviews prior to purchasing this I didn’t find them helpful. I ordered the cozy chic track pant. I am 6’0 and weigh 145lbs. I ordered the small in sea salt. They are not see through (someone had said they are). They fit my length perfect and have a roomy look to them at ankle like the model does in the pic on amazon. The waist band is slightly tighter than the cozy chic wide legged pant, but not tight at all. Just more fitted. The same goes for down the quad/thigh area. Slightly more fitted. I would order a small again. Hope this helps. Most recent review on BFD track pant- don’t dry them n dryer cuz A LOT of the cozy ends up n ur dryer lint AND the sea salt “white” color becomes very dingy after a few washes. I have all the other colors n BFD and this is the only one that doesn’t wash well.
